item.title: About
item.description: Me Hi! My name is Calvin-Khang Ta and I am currently a PhD student at the University of California, Riverside. My research interests are currently methods involving self supervised learning and multi task learning. Publications Poisson2Sparse: Self-Supervised Poisson Denoising From a Single Image Calvin-Khang Ta*, Abhishek Aich*, Akash Gupta*, Amit K. Roy-Chowdhury (* joint first authors) MICCAI, 2022 Project page Code
